mapper.select: select count(*) from tuser where EMAIL= #{email}
mapper.insert: insert into tuser(USER_NUM, EMAIL, PWD, U_LASTNAME, U_FSTNAME, U_BIRTHDAY) values(concat('U',SEQ_USER.nextval),#{email}, #{pwd}, #{uLastname}, #{uFstname}, #{uBirthday})
mapper.update: update tuser set EMAIL=#{email}, PWD=#{pwd}, U_LASTNAME=#{uLastname}, U_FSTNAME=#{uFstname}, U_BIRTHDAY=#{uBirthday} where USER_NUM=#{userNum}
